description: This file defines two reusable Flutter widgets: LoadingView and ErrorView, used for displaying loading indicators and error messages respectively.

classes.name: LoadingView
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a centered loading indicator with an optional message.

classes.name: ErrorView
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays an error message with an optional retry button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for LoadingView and ErrorView widgets.
